physical_appearance:\The image shows a photograph in black-and-white that is enclosed by a white frame. There are two lorries
 one from its back and the other from its side captured in the photograph. There are several wicker baskets present on the open cargo areas of the lorries. Workers are also standing on the lorries as well as on the ground. One wicker basket is shown being transferred from one lorry to the other by a couple of workers. The background of the photograph shows several roofed buildings. At the bottom of the photograph to the left hand side
 there is a designation of \\2/15\\. At the bottom right hand side
subject_terms_1:there is a signature in Chinese characters. \ blue collar workers transporting baskets (containers) trade (function)

metadata.physical_appearance: "The image shows a photograph in black-and-white that is enclosed by a white frame. There are two lorries, one from its back and the other from its side captured in the photograph. There are several wicker baskets present on the open cargo areas of the lorries. Workers are also standing on the lorries as well as on the ground. One wicker basket is shown being transferred from one lorry to the other by a couple of workers. The background of the photograph shows several roofed buildings. At the bottom of the photograph to the left hand side, there is a designation of ""2/15"". At the bottom right hand side
